entryPoints.title: Entry points
entryPoints.description: An array of glob patterns for pages on your site. Recursive traversal will start from these

recursive.description: Recurse through all the links and asset references on your page, starting at the entrypoints

pretty.description: Checklinks outputs TAP (https://testanything.org/tap-version-13-specification.html) by default. Enabling pretty mode makes the output easier on the eyes.

checkExternal.description: Report on all broken links to extrnal pages. Enabling this will make your tests more brittle, since you can't control external pages.

followSourceMaps.description: Enable to check references to source maps, source map sources etc. Many build tools don't emit working references, so this is disabled by default

skipPatterns.title: Skip patterns
skipPatterns.description: You can mark some check as skipped, which will block checklinks from ever attempting to execute them. skipPatterns is an array of strings you can match against failing reports

todoPatterns.title: Todo patterns
todoPatterns.description: You can mark some check as todo, which will execute the check, but allow failures. todoPatterns is an array of strings you can match against failing reports
